title: How to Make a Duct Tape Belt

steps.headline: Take the duct and wrap it around body (sticky side away from clothes)
Cut tape (it can be however long you want it to be)
Create the other side of the belt.
steps.description:
You can do this either way:
Fold the piece of duct tape in half lengthwise
Cut tape to equal length as other piece. Line up the pieces of duct tape and put the sticky sides together.

steps.headline: Take a hole puncher and make the holes on your belt.
Use whatever you would like to go through the holes, or tape a belt loop onto the belt.
Give your belt to someone or wear it!

text:
Take the duct and wrap it around body (sticky side away from clothes)  Cut tape (it can be however long you want it to be)  Create the other side of the belt. You can do this either way:
Fold the piece of duct tape in half lengthwise
Cut tape to equal length as other piece. Line up the pieces of duct tape and put the sticky sides together. Take a hole puncher and make the holes on your belt.  Use whatever you would like to go through the holes, or tape a belt loop onto the belt.  Give your belt to someone or wear it!
